languages.text: {n}Савант выпрямляется — насколько позволяет ее искривленный позвоночник — и щелкает несколькими реле на лицевых аугментах, после чего, игнорируя Хейнрикса, поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Кого вы привели с собой, дознаватель ван Калокс? Какой уровень доступа?"

{n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"
languages.original_text: {n}Савант выпрямляется — насколько позволяет ее искривленный позвоночник — и щелкает несколькими реле на лицевых аугментах, после чего, игнорируя Хейнрикса, поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Кого вы привели с собой, дознаватель ван Калокс? Какой уровень доступа?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜在脊椎允许的范围内尽可能地挺直了身体，打开了面部植入物的几个开关。随后，她将视线转向了你，完全没有在意海因里希说了什么。{/n}“冯·卡洛克斯审讯官，与你同行的这个人是谁？安全级别？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜在脊椎允许的范围内尽可能地挺直了身体，打开了面部植入物的几个开关。随后，她将视线转向了你，完全没有在意海因里希说了什么。{/n}“冯·卡洛克斯审讯官，与你同行的这个人是谁？安全级别？”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}La sabia se estira tanto como le permite su espalda jorobada y activa varios interruptores de sus aumentos faciales. Después se gira hacia ti, haciendo caso omiso a las palabras de Heinrix.{/n} «¿A quién ha traído con usted, interrogador van Calox? ¿Nivel de acceso?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La sabia se estira tanto como le permite su espalda jorobada y activa varios interruptores de sus aumentos faciales. Después se gira hacia ti, haciendo caso omiso a las palabras de Heinrix.{/n} «¿A quién ha traído con usted, interrogador van Calox? ¿Nivel de acceso?».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}賢者は姿勢を、彼女の曲がった背骨が許す限り正して顔のオーグメティックのいくつかのスイッチを押した。それから彼女はハインリックスの言葉を完全に無視してあなたの方を向く。{/n}「誰を連れてきたのですか、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス？クリアランスレベルは？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"

traits.locale_text: {n}賢者は姿勢を、彼女の曲がった背骨が許す限り正して顔のオーグメティックのいくつかのスイッチを押した。それから彼女はハインリックスの言葉を完全に無視してあなたの方を向く。{/n}「誰を連れてきたのですか、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス？クリアランスレベルは？」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}La sage se redresse, aussi haut que sa colonne vertébrale tordue le lui permet, et active plusieurs interrupteurs sur ses augmentations faciales. Elle se tourne ensuite vers vous, ignorant totalement les paroles d'Heinrix.{/n} « Qui donc avez-vous amené avec vous, interrogateur van Calox ? Niveau d'habilitation ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La sage se redresse, aussi haut que sa colonne vertébrale tordue le lui permet, et active plusieurs interrupteurs sur ses augmentations faciales. Elle se tourne ensuite vers vous, ignorant totalement les paroles d'Heinrix.{/n} « Qui donc avez-vous amené avec vous, interrogateur van Calox ? Niveau d'habilitation ? »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Die Weise richtet sich auf – soweit ihre gekrümmte Wirbelsäule es zulässt – und drückt mehrere Schalter an ihren Gesichtsaugmentationen. Dann wendet sie sich dir zu und ignoriert Heinrix' Worte komplett.{/n} "Wen habt Ihr da mitgebracht, Interrogator van Calox? Freigabestufe?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Weise richtet sich auf – soweit ihre gekrümmte Wirbelsäule es zulässt – und drückt mehrere Schalter an ihren Gesichtsaugmentationen. Dann wendet sie sich dir zu und ignoriert Heinrix' Worte komplett.{/n} "Wen habt Ihr da mitgebracht, Interrogator van Calox? Freigabestufe?"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Âlim, kambur omurgasının müsaade ettiği ölçüde dikleşiyor, yüzündeki ogmentlerindeki birkaç düğme tıkırdıyor. Sonrasında Heinrix'in söylediklerini tamamen yok sayarak sana dönüyor.{/n} "Yanında getirdiğin de kim Sorgucu van Calox? Yetki seviyesin nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Sage draws herself upright — as far as her crooked spine will allow — and flicks several switches on her facial augments. Then she turns to you, ignoring Heinrix's words completely.{/n} "Who have you brought with you, Interrogator van Calox? Clearance level?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Âlim, kambur omurgası izin verdiği ölçüde dikleşiyor ve yüzündeki ogmentlerindeki birkaç düğme tıkırdıyor. Ardından Heinrix'in söylediklerini tamamen yok sayarak sana dönüyor.{/n} "Yanında getirdiğin de kim Sorgucu van Calox? Yetki seviyesi?"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
